Blindness.name: Blindness
Blindness.desc: The unit forfeits its turn and cannot take any actions.

Boar Saliva.name: Boar Saliva
Boar Saliva.desc: The unit has a {}% probability of missing their physical attacks.

Pegasus Light.name: Pegasus Light
Pegasus Light.desc: Each unit attacking the target will receive +{} morale.

Paralysis.name: Paralysis
Paralysis.desc: The affected enemy is unable to move and has {}% damage reduction.

Deep Wounds.name: Deep Wounds
Deep Wounds.desc: Next attack with Deep Wounds ability will deal {}% more damage.

Aggr.name: Aggr
Aggr.desc: Forces the target to retaliate only against the attacker, ignoring all other enemies.

Break.desc: Disables all the unit's abilities for one turn.
